title: I miss the "Choose Both" button for summoner spells
body:
http://i.imgur.com/7nWTdoi.png

When they added the new ward icon selection to champion select, they took away the "Choose Both" button that let you quickly pick both of your summoner spells.

As someone who doesn't always take Flash on all their champions, I miss this button since I actually do want to change both summoner spells quite often.

replies.body: Yeah i agree, they should bring that back.
